message: This message is to inform you that iQIES may experience interruptions due to HARP maintenance between Friday, October 18, 5:00 PM ET and Monday, October 21, 6:00 AM ET. Users may experience interruptions requesting and approving roles. On October 26th data processing and reports may be delayed from 9:00 ET until 10:00 ET. Processing and reports will resume automatically once maintenance concludes.
